title: The Bella Twins added to Chicago's Wine & Food Experience tour hosted by USA TODAY
text:
CLOSE

The Bella Twins added to Chicago's Wine & Food Experience by USA TODAY. (Photo: Brian Ach, Getty Images for WWE)

The Bella Twins will be making an appearance at almost every city on the USA Today's Wine & Food Experience Tour — and they haven't forgotten about Chicago.

Brie and Nikki Bella will be hosting a special session during their Chicago stop, which will allow them to personally meet with attendees in an intimate setting.

On Nov. 16, guests will have a chance to "Wine Down" with the professional wrestling duo during their meet and greet event with wine from their personal label, Belle Radici. The meet-up will consist of a Q&A session and the twins will also be available for photo opportunities.

The USA TODAY Wine & Food Experience is a gourmet event for locals and visitors to sample an eclectic collection of culinary offerings. Guests also have the opportunity to learn from and interact with celebrated chefs, entertainers and industry leaders.

More: Get a taste of the nation's fanciest food & wine festival, with Martha Stewart, top chefs

This Bella Twins meet and greet will require a separate add-on ticket, which can be purchased here. You'll also need to buy separate tickets to the Grand Tasting to enter the Wine & Food Experience.

The Chicago leg of the Wine & Food tour will bring together more than 30 restaurants featuring the area's local flavors and cuisines as well as wines and craft beers. The event will also include culinary demonstrations and wine and spirits seminars that are open to all Grand Tasting ticket holders.

Special guests Antoni Porowski of "Queer Eye" and Scott Conant of "Chopped" will also be in attendance. The two will host separate informal presentations, meet and greet sessions and cooking demonstrations.

Tickets sold out during 2018's Wine & Food Experience Tour so getting them in advance is recommended.
